thread.title: Countdown's Rachel Riley reveals the grossest chat up line she's ever heard
thread.title_full: Countdown's Rachel Riley reveals the grossest chat up line she's ever heard

author: Jennifer Crothers
title: Countdown's Rachel Riley reveals the grossest chat up line she's ever heard
text:
Countdown's Rachel Riley reveals the grossest chat up line she's ever heard The Countdown numbers and letters pro saw the NSFW message on a pal's Tinder Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Rachel Riley receives the WORST chat-up line in dating history Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Countdown presenter Rachel Riley has revealed the worst-ever chat up line she’s encountered. 
The star, who is dating Strictly hottie Pasha Kovalev, admitted she was scrolling through her mate’s Tinder when the choice pick up line came through. 
Speaking on 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown, Rachel admitted she’d been sent a right shocker on the app. 
“The worst chat-up line I’ve heard is ‘I’ve got a purple dome that needs a home’,” she revealed to the world, with the audience and panel grossed out by the line. Rachel was just having a swipe on Tinder when the message came through (Photo: Channel 4) Rachel recounted the tale to the panel (Photo: Channel 4) Jon Richardson and Michelle Wolf thought it was all a bit rank (Photo: Channel 4) Jimmy Carr piped up (Photo: Channel 4) 
“You know what Rachel, if you’re not interested, just say you’re not interested,” joked host Jimmy Carr, before Jon Richardson added, "I've got a little mouse that needs a house." 
But thankfully she's loved up with dancer Pasha so isn't subjected to cringeworthy pick up lines often. 
Last year Rachel revealed she was learning Russian so she could talk to her boyfriend's friends and family. 
She said: “I like pushing myself now. I’m at my most fulfilled challenging myself with something that scares me. Rachel and Pasha, photogenic couple goals (Photo: Getty Images) Read More Rachel Riley looks AMAZING in sheer-panelled dress as she enjoys Julien MacDonald fashion show 
“Russian is a really hard language – but I’ve got my own personal teacher. He’s been really patient. 
“I met some of Pasha’s friends a year ago and couldn’t speak a word. I met them again a year later and could have a conversation. 
"They were surprised. They ask where I picked up some rude words. Pasha’s a gentleman, he doesn’t teach me those – but I go to parties and people tell me them.” Like us on Facebook
